thread.title: Watch This Intimate Behind-the-Scenes Video of Fear of God’s Fifth Collection Shoot
thread.title_full: Watch This Intimate Behind-the-Scenes Video of Fear of God’s Fifth Collection Shoot

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Watch This Intimate Behind-the-Scenes Video of Fear of God’s Fifth Collection Shoot
text:
Jerry Lorenzo’s faith and family values have always been reflected in his clothes, with Fear of God’s collection unveilings almost sermon-like in scope. The newly released collection five lookbook typified FoG’s unique aesthetic approach and featured appearances from Lorenzo’s son as well as models such as Geron McKinley, Sasha Lane, and Adonis Bosso.
Now, thanks to a behind-the-scenes video, we can take a look at how the warm-hearted shoot came together. Jerry can be seen hanging out and directing his models, while there’s also some intimate shots of quality father-and-son bonding. As Chance the Rapper’s “Finish Line / Drown” rap-gospel banger draws the cut to a close, the pair can be seen walking away in adorable matching jackets. Aww.

Watch the video above, and then see Offset of Migo’s fame star in our exclusive editorial.
